long_description: Made in Italy, the men's VonZipper Snark Sunglasses offer next-generation style as well as 100% UV protection for all your casual summer fun. Navy frames come with Galactic Glo lenses that block 90% of visible light and 100% of harmful UV rays. Polycarbonate lenses are lightweight and virtually shatterproof. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames remain flexible at any temperature and are extremely impact resistant. VonZipper Snark Sunglasses have protective lens coatings to resist water, smudging, scratching and impact. Stainless-steel hinges add durability.
short_description: Made in Italy, the men's VonZipper Snark Sunglasses offer next-generation style as well as 100% UV protection for all your casual summer fun.
